title: 2 BED/2.5 BATH+NEAR Hospital, North Point Mall, University/Colleges##
posting_body: FULL BRICK TWO STORY CORNER LOT 2BR/ 2 FULL BA & 1 HALF BA TOWNHOME located in the center of ALPHARETTA.
Centrally located for Jobs, Downtown Alpharetta.
Close to AVALON Center, Shopping, Dining, Hospital, North Point Mall, University/Colleges and shop-strip centers.
Spacious family room with Fireplace, View to covered patio, Nice Kitchen and Break fast area.
